fuel_price = lambda l,p: round(l*(p-min(0.05*(l//2), 0.25)), 2)

def fuel_price(litres, price_per_liter):
    return litres * max(price_per_liter-.25, price_per_liter-.05*(litres//2))

def fuel_price(litres: int, price_per_liter: int) -> float:
    return litres * (price_per_liter - 0.05 * min(litres // 2, 5))

def fuel_price(l, ppl):
    return round(l*(ppl - min(l//2 * 0.05, 0.25)), 2)

def fuel_price(l, ppl):
    return round(l * (ppl - min(l // 2 * .05, .25)), 2)

def fuel_price(litres, price_per_liter):
    return round(litres * (price_per_liter - min((litres // 2) * 0.05, 0.25)), 2)

def fuel_price(lt, pr):
    return lt * pr - lt * (lt // 2 * 0.05) if lt <= 10 else lt * pr - lt * 0.25

def fuel_price(litres, price_per_litre):
    return litres * price_per_litre - ((2 <= litres < 4) * 0.05 * litres) - ((4 <= litres < 6) * 0.1 * litres) - ((6 <= litres < 8) * 0.15 * litres) - ((8 <= litres < 10) * 0.2 * litres) - ((10 <= litres) * 0.25 * litres)

def fuel_price(litres, price_per_litre):
    return litres * (price_per_litre - 0.25) if litres >= 10 else round(litres * (price_per_litre - (litres // 2 * 5) / 100), 2)

def fuel_price(l, p):
    return round(l*(p-min(0.05*(l//2), 0.25)), 2)

def fuel_price(litres, price_per_litre):
    return round(litres*(price_per_litre-min(0.05*(litres//2), 0.25)), 2)

def fuel_price(litres, price_per_litre):
    return litres * max(price_per_litre-.25, price_per_litre-.05*(litres//2))

def fuel_price(litres, price_per_liter):
    return litres*price_per_liter-min(0.05*(litres//2),0.25)*litres

def fuel_price(litres, price_per_liter):
    return round(litres * (price_per_liter - .05 * min(litres // 2, 5)), 2)

def fuel_price(litres, price_per_liter):
    return litres * (price_per_liter - (0.01* (5*litres/2 if litres % 2 == 0 else 5*(litres -1)/2) if litres <=10 else 0.25))

def fuel_price(litres, price_per_liter):
    return round(litres*(price_per_liter-(min(25, (litres/2)*5)/100)), 2)

def fuel_price(litres, price_per_liter):
    return round(litres * max(price_per_liter - 0.25, price_per_liter - 0.05 * (litres//2)), 2)

def fuel_price(litres, price_per_liter):
    if 2 <= litres < 4:                                  #if liters are more than 2 and less than 4
        return round(litres*(price_per_liter - 0.05), 2) #return price minus 5 cents/0.05
    if 4 <= litres < 6:                                  #if liters are more or equal 4 and less than 6
        return round(litres*(price_per_liter - 0.1), 2)  #return price minus 10 cents/0.10
    if 6 <= litres < 8:                                  #if liters are more or equal 6 and less than 8
        return round(litres*(price_per_liter - 0.15), 2) #return price minus 15 cents/0.15
    if 8 <= litres < 10:                                 #if liters are more or equal 8 and less than 10
        return round(litres*(price_per_liter - 0.2), 2)  #return price minus 20 cents/0.20
    if litres >= 10:                                     #if liters are more or equal 10
        return round(litres*(price_per_liter - 0.25), 2) #return price minus 25 cents/0.25

def fuel_price(l, p):
    return l*p - l*min(.25, (l//2)*5*.01)

def fuel_price(litres, price_per_liter):
    if litres >= 2 :d = litres * 0.05
    if litres >= 4 :d = litres * 0.10
    if litres >= 6 :d = litres * 0.15
    if litres >= 8 :d = litres * 0.20
    if litres >= 10 :d = litres * 0.25
    
    return litres * price_per_liter - d

def fuel_price(litres, price_per_liter):
    return litres*(price_per_liter-0.25) if litres >= 10 else litres*(price_per_liter-0.10) if litres >= 4 else litres*(price_per_liter-0.05)

def fuel_price(litres, price_per_liter):
    return round(litres * (price_per_liter - {0: 0, 1: .05, 2: .10, 3: .15, 4: .20}.get(litres // 2, .25)), 2)
